titleStmt.title: By the Lords justices and councell. VV. Parsons. Io. Borlase. Whereas many malignant and divellish papists, and Jesuits friars, seminary priests, and other superstitious orders of the Popish pretended cleargie, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.

notesStmt.note: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
